name: access-credential-disable
description: Enumerated values indicating whether a credential is disabled and how it was disabled.

values.name: none
values.description: Specifies that the credential is not disabled.

values.name: disable
values.description: Specifies that the credential is disabled.

values.name: disable-manual
values.description: Specifies that the credential is disabled manually.

values.name: disable-lockout
values.description: Specifies that the credential is disabled due to lockout.
